# ğŸ‘€ Bookshelf View

  Execute commands based on what an entity sees.

> "Vision is the act of seeing things as they could be, not as they are."
> â€” Gretchen Rubin

## âœ¨ Features

- **ğŸ¯ Aimed Detection**: Execute commands at aimed blocks, entities, and points.
- **ğŸ—ï¸ Block Placement**: Precise control over block placement positions.
- **ğŸ‘ï¸ Entity Vision**: Run commands based on entity line of sight.

ğŸ“š [Read the full documentation](https://docs.mcbookshelf.dev/en/latest/modules/view.html)
